testcase.name: Given The user requests a GET request for the ZipCode "94040,US"
Then The weather is returned with Status code 200
Then The weather is returned with Status code 200
Given The user requests a GET request for the City Name "London,UK"
Then The weather is returned with Status code 200
Then The weather is returned with Status code 200
Given The user requests a GET request for the City ID "581w5135"

failure.message: 1 expectation failed. JSON path $ doesn't match. Expected: map containing ["weather"->ANYTHING] Actual: {cod=400, message=581w5135 is not a city ID}

testcase.name: Then The weather is returned with Status code 200
Given The user requests temperature for the ZipCode "94040,US" from local server
Given The user requests temperature for the City Name "London,UK" from local server
Given The user requests temperature for the City ID "5815135" from local server
Then The weather is returned with Status code 200
